chart_description: The chart shows the memory usage (in MiB) of the various systemd services running on the system.

dimension_descriptions.system-slice_acpid-service: Memory used by the acpid service.
dimension_descriptions.system-slice_amazon-ssm-agent-service: Memory used by the Amazon SSM agent service.
